forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers and patchy fog before 9am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers between 9am and 10am, then rain showers likely and patchy fog between 10am and 2pm, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 69. Southeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 57. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Boston, a thick veil of fog shrouds the skyline, lending the city an air of mystery. Early rain showers sprinkle the streets, creating a gentle symphony of droplets against the pavement, yet the day will soon unveil itself to the likelihood of more substantial rainfall and rumbling thunderstorms. A lightly blowing southeast wind carries the promise of a warm, humid afternoon, with a high temperature flirting just below 70 degrees. The atmospheric embrace feels heavy, thick with the scent of wet earth and the anticipation of an impending storm, inviting you to take shelter or perhaps venture out with cautious hope.

As the clouds loom larger and darker throughout the day, it may be wise to dress in layers: a light waterproof jacket over a cozy sweater, perhaps, paired with comfortable footwear to navigate puddles that are sure to gather on the cobblestone streets. While the weather may dictate a preference for indoors, consider finding pleasure in the stillness of a local café—warm, steaming coffee in hand—as you watch the world outside slowly transform under a curtain of rain. The cozy ambiance of a bookstore or an art gallery could offer a refuge, allowing you to explore quietly while the storm rages on. As the evening approaches, with temperatures cooling but the rain still at play, you might wish to settle in for a movie or an engrossing read, embracing the comforts of the indoor world until the clouds finally begin to clear.
